displaytitle: The Standard-Bearer, turned to the right
dimensions: plate (sheet trimmed to plate): 21.5 × 15.5 cm (8 7/16 × 6 1/8 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Junius S. Morgan, Class of 1888
markings:
Collector stamp in black ink, verso lower left: F. Seymour Haden (Lugt 1227)

Collector stamp in blue ink, verso lower left: (Lugt 896)

In graphite, verso lower left: Junius S. Morgan (Lugt 1536)
inscribed:
Dated in plate, lower center: Ao 85

Signed in plate, lower center right: HGoltzius fecit

texts.textentryhtml: Francis Seymour Haden [1818-1910, Lugt 1227]; sale of his collection, London, June 15-19, 1891, lot 143. Junius S. Morgan [1867-1932, Lugt 1536]; bequeathed to Princeton University Art Museum, 1932.
